query:
SELECT sc.id, sc.status, sc.hasDivergence, sc.completedAt,
       COUNT(sci.id) as itemCount,
       SUM(CASE WHEN sci.divergence != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as divergentCount
FROM stageChecks sc
LEFT JOIN stageCheckItems sci ON sc.id = sci.stageCheckId
WHERE sc.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005'
GROUP BY sc.id;

       COUNT(sci.id) as itemCount,
       SUM(CASE WHEN sci.divergence != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as divergentCount

LEFT JOIN stageCheckItems sci ON sc.id = sci.stageCheckId
WHERE sc.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005'
